channel.title: Java Not found
channel.description:
Java not found while compiling on a few compilers and others say path not found..
my class path is = .;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip path = C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin
My java is in program (x86)

item.title: Java Not found
item.dc:creator: @sinzscapeserver sinzscapeserver
item.description:
@sinzscapeserver wrote:

Install 64 bit java/java jdk instead

Read full topic

item.title: Java Not found
item.dc:creator: @Im_Key Im Key
item.description:
@Im_Key wrote:

This

log4j-1.2.15.jar;

Isn’t the java version so don’t change that

Try adding this at the start of it…

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe"
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk.1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server

Read full topic

item.title: Java Not found
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

I use ventrilo if you have a mic, but you see the 15? change that to 21.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Not found
item.dc:creator: @Xsimplicity Xsimplicity
item.description:
@Xsimplicity wrote:

Sorry, do you have msn?

& and my run says

@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

item.title: Java Not found
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

When in your source and client folders, have you right clicked -> edit -> and changed the number in there to 21 - which is the updated version of JDK?

Change the number in there (mine shows 11 when I started) - Change it to 21.

Read full topic
